panels.title: Accept Rate
panels.description: 75-85% = optimal (critical review). >95% = rubber stamping. <60% = poor config.

panels.title: Cache Hit Rate
panels.description: % of token reads from cache. >90% = excellent. <80% = improve CLAUDE.md.

panels.title: Tokens/Session
panels.description: Proxy for compaction risk. <100k = efficient (green). >300k = likely compaction (red).

panels.title: Cost/PR
panels.description: Target: <$5. Lower is better ROI.

panels.title: Cost/Session
panels.description: Benchmark: ~$0.07/session. >$0.50 = expensive.

panels.title: Cost/Commit
panels.description: Cost per git commit made via Claude.

panels.title: Sessions/PR
panels.description: How many sessions to produce a PR. Lower = efficient.

panels.title: Cost/User/Day
panels.description: Daily cost per active user. Adapts to time range selected.

panels.title: Projected Monthly
panels.description: ⚠️ Requires 1d+ time range for accuracy. Projects current cost rate to 30 days per user.

panels.title: Developer Metrics
panels.description: Accept Rate: 75-85% optimal. Cache Ratio: higher = better CLAUDE.md

targets.expr: 100 * sum by (user_email) (max_over_time(claude_code_code_edit_tool_decision_total{user_email=~"$developer",decision="accept"}[$__range])) / on(user_email) group_left() (sum by (user_email) (claude_code_code_edit_tool_decision_total) > 0) or sum by (user_email) (max_over_time(claude_code_cost_usage_USD_total{user_email=~"$developer"}[$__range])) * 0 + 100

panels.title: Model Usage by Developer
panels.description: Shows which models each developer is using and associated costs

panels.title: Team Tool Distribution
panels.description: Most used tools across all team members

panels.title: Tool Usage Over Time
panels.description: Tool calls trend across the team

panels.title: Tool Efficiency Indicators
panels.description: Read:Write ratio (higher = more exploration). Bash usage (execution). Task usage (delegation).

panels.title: Active Time
panels.description: Total time developers spent actively using Claude Code

panels.title: Cost/Hour
panels.description: Cost per hour of active Claude Code usage

panels.title: Refactor Ratio
panels.description: Lines removed / lines added. >0.5 = healthy refactoring. <0.2 = only adding code.

panels.title: Model Preference by Developer
panels.description: Shows model choice for each developer. Use Developer filter above.

panels.title: ⚠️ Long Sessions (No Commits)
panels.description: Sessions >200k tokens with 0 commits. May indicate developers getting stuck or going in circles.

targets.expr:
count(
          (sum by (session_id) (max_over_time(claude_code_token_usage_tokens_total{user_email=~"$developer"}[$__range])) > 200000)
          unless
          (sum by (session_id) (max_over_time(claude_code_commit_count_total{user_email=~"$developer"}[$__range])) > 0)
        ) or vector(0)

panels.title: ⚠️ Rejection Rate
panels.description: % of edits rejected. High rejection (>40%) may indicate miscommunication with Claude.
